I am petite (5’ 95lbs) and got the small. The material is thick and has good stretch, very much like a spandex or bathing suit. I think the small was definitely my size (and am sure a medium would be too big) but I wish it were not so tight/fitted around the torso, just so it would be a little more comfortable drinking, eating, etc. The color I got was “marsala” and looked very much like the picture — like a deep dusty rose with more red. Great color that pairs well with off-white, apricot, or cream pants.

The color and quality of the bodysuit are awesome but the leg holes are very high cut, the crotch is very long and narrow, and the body suit itself is on the shorter side. I loved it so much I kept it and tried to find a way to wear it comfortably, but it looks like it’s destined for the trash

The color Marsala is beautiful and the fabric is so luxurious. It’s so soft and very stretchy - I have a short torso and this is not too long but if you were taller, it would stretch and not be uncomfortable! The v is not too deep for those of us with larger chests - which i was concerned about.

I am 4’11 120lbs and got an XS. I have only good thought about this shirt. The stretch is perfect. It’s not see-through. I have a long torso and it wasn’t pulling too much in the front or back. The neck line is perfect, I do not have big boobs, 30B. Highly recommend.

评论概述: BODYSUITS ARE GREAT FOR PLUS SIZES!

I recently purchased this bodysuit, and it's truly a game-changer in my wardrobe. The fabric feels incredibly smooth and creamy against the skin. I've worn these for both casual and work. Highly recommend it to anyone looking for the perfect bodysuit!

Material is soft, not see through, and extremely comfortable. Quality item. Design for the back makes it so you have no panty lines. Very slimming. Also very easy restroom use. Have bought in multiple neckline, sleeve styles and colors.
Love this body suit and the color is perfect!
The quality of this material feels so soft and felt great on my body. I own some skims bodysuits, which are also amazing. However, skims is so expensive. I feel like this is the best alternative.

I really like this one. The material is nice and soft and it has a nice smoothing effect. It washes pretty well and it fits true to size. So far my second favorite  bodysuit out of like 20 I have.

The cloud material is a DREAM. But it definitely fits snugly. While I'm usually a Large, I ended up going to 2XL so I didn't feel sucked in the whole time. I now have two sizes I can choose from depending on the look I'm going for. Don't be afraid to size up with this material!

I had been looking for an alternative to other 'name brand' body suits. I wanted to be able to afford purchasing multiple as I wear them to work. I am 5'11 & 168 lbs with a size 34H chest. Overall, I am really pleased with how they fit!

This bodysuit is very comfortable.  The double layer is soft, and smoothing!  I love it!
This shirt is slightly sheer, you’ll definitely see whatever you’re wearing underneath. It’s really soft and stretchy. Great feeling material. Would recommend.

Runs a little on the small side but fit great for a sleek look. Very smooth and did not have to worry about being see-through. Closet staple for sure!

I want to love these body suits - they're so smooth, they're not see through, and the sleeves are long enough. However, the leg cut on them is so high that unless I wear jeans up to my belly button, the leg cut shows above my waist band. I'm 5'9" and I've tried both the L and XL options...no luck.

Not sure what happened. I ordered 2 and my other 1 came in perfect. This 1 was pulled and was peeling all over. It did not come in an official pumeiy bag either. 评论概述: Thick fabric, cute style, and sturdy snaps
评论详情: I love this bodysuit! I am not typically a bodysuit person but this one is super comfortable and good quality. My only complaint is that the sleeves could be a little longer. But they are stretchy and fit well. I got a size small and it fits well, the material is really stretchy too. I have tried a couple other bodysuits from this brand and ended up returning them. What I’ve found is that the fabric of Pumiey’s Pro collection is softer, thicker, and better in my opinion than the others. In lighter colors like the white, the sleeves are sheer and presents as different color than the torso portion. The black is not this way, however. Overall, a great basic

One of my favorite body suits. White isn’t see through either.

I love this brand of body suits, they are so soft and comfy and the fit is awesome. I am a size 18 and ordered the 2XL and it fits perfect. I had to return the first body suit because it looked like it was used and make up all over it, but the second one shipped perfect.
The material is soft and stretchy.  It is black so it collects bits of dust and hair. Overall,  very happy with my purchase.

I love Pumiey! Their bodysuits are so soft and extremely stretchy! I can wear both small and medium. They're just so stretchy that each size is so versatile. It is lightweight, yet you can't see through it, which is amazing. I have a long torso, and this still fit great, without being tight down there and it doesn't ride up on me like some bodysuits.

Whoo this is a HOT pink. It pops a lot in real life, going to have to mute it down with some layers I think. This V neck is great quality and the blue is exactly as shown. I’m 5’10’ and got Medium and fit was perfect.
This brand never misses for me. I have so many styles and colors. Looks very high quality for the price.
Great fit soft material but this is not a good look since item is brand new

I have purchased several Pumiey bodysuits, and this one pilled horribly. I make sure to wash my bodysuits in the delicate cycle, yet this one ended up looking like this after only being worn and washed one time. Not worth the money!
This was not good quality like some reviews say. The sleeves were so thin. Found much better ones elsewhere.
It’s super soft and comfortable and fits great. I’m a small size and usually get small or XS shirts but this fit me beautifully in a small.  Definitely a great piece to add to any wardrobe.

Omg I love all of Pumeiy’s bodysuits for their comfort and super soft material but they’re too good to be true. Exactly what I was looking for. I'm a size 4 - 5.5" and 127 pounds and I bought a small. Plenty of length to snap without struggle.

Fits perfectly.  I will get a lot of use out of this!

This bodysuit is a staple! It is very comfortable and has a buttery soft fabric. Fits true to size. Definitely recommend if you’re looking for a bodysuit that will last a while!!
Very pretty mauve color, with bottom clasps for easy on and off
I made the decision to purchase 2 items from this company every month. These shirts feel like glove, aren’t see through, and are buttery soft.

I love bodysuits and wear them usually every day. I wear them under my Scrubs to work to keep me warm. This one isn't in my work pile. It's so nice and soft as can be! I accidentally ordered 2 sizes bigger and it is stretchy, so it is loose on me. It still looks good and I tighten it with a DIY hack and it's good to go. It is very flattering and I love the neckline! It's very comfortable and nicely made. I would say it runs true to size even though mine is 2 sizes too big. I love it and will continue to wear it!

Very stretchy and supportive, has a good amount of tummy control. Great basic for any wardrobe, can be paired with jeans, slacks or sweats. The V is a perfect amount of plunge, not much cleavage shows. I am 5'6 145lbs (34 DD) and the medium was a perfect fit.
Just wow, amazing!!

评论概述: Quality: Not in the best condition
评论详情: Let me just say I really like this brand and will buy this one again. But as soon as I opened the package I could tell it had been previously opened/tried on because it was stuffed in the vendor packaging not folded. It looked like it was ironed and the front of the shirt was imprinted on the back which caused me to inspect the shirt more. I also found some wear under the arm where the fabric starts to develop balls like a worn sweater. However, I purchased this brand before with no issue and the fabric is very nice so I'm going to return it for the same shirt. I just expect brand new merchandise if I'm paying for brand new merchandise.
